website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung SyncMaster P2770FH's disappointing performance and lack of features make it definitely not first choice among 27-inchers.
pros: The Samsung SyncMaster P2770FH provides a large screen for a relatively low price and although its design is a couple years old, it still looks quite stylish
cons: The Samsung SyncMaster P2770FH has a noticeable green push and lacks connection options compared with other 27-inchers

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but it has one problem
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor refurbished and use it as a monitor and TV combination. Overall the product is great: looks great, clear picture, easy to setup. Since my product is refurbished, I have an issue that the monitor shuts off sometimes in the middle of watching something. I think it is to prevent overheating, even though the monitor doesn't get hot. Some other small issues are that the touch screen buttons are a little too sensitive to touch, there is no remote control, and no speakers on this unit. Overall, I am very happy. The display is very crisp and colorful. Great resolution on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: GKV

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 27' Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is the best monitor I have ever had. 27 inches of pure beauty. The colors are great and the response time for playing games is "WOW". The problems reported about problems with the power button and adjustment for this monitor are misleading to say the least. I have not had one problem using these controls since I first turned it on. This monitor for the price is fantastic. You cannot go wrong with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: G. Baes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my mum, however I didn't realize it didn't have speakers! Woops. Separate speakers are known to have better quality anyway so no worries. Came before I expected it and really happy with the quality, timing, pixels, etc. I have a 37" Samsung TV at home as well, and was so impressed with the quality I bought a Samsung laptop. Great products and will continue to buy Sansung!

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, great look, alot of display options. Touch button control settings can be a tad annoying to use since, but I don't consider it to by much of a problem. A+ I'm very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a larger monitor but was worried about gaming on one. I found this one and read a couple reviews and most said it was good. I found that this monitor has been excellent. I do games like BF3 and World of Warcraft and it runs perfect with no blocking at all. The only down side of this monitor is the buttons, they are a little cumbersome but once you get all your settings done you don't have to play with them again so not a huge deal breaker. Performance is a 10 out of 10.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for great value
customer_reviews.text: As the title states, this is an awesome monitor for a great price. I don't do a lot of gaming but have to make quite a few presentations on it and the quality is impeccable. Unlike other/older versions, it does tilt. Has DVI and HDMI ports. I've only used the DVI as that is the output from my MacBook Pro, but it looks great. Had it for 4 months now and no dead pixels. As long and you wake your computer up before turning the monitor on so that there is signal output, it recognizes the input right away. If not then having to scroll through the inputs manually is pretty annoying. I highly recommend this monitor.

product_meta.title: Samsung P2770FH 27-Inch Full HD LCD Monitor (Rose Black)
product_meta.description: Presenting a monitor fast enough for gaming, movies and everything else in life. Presenting the Samsung 27" P2770FH LCD. It features a lightning-fast, industry-leading 1 millisecond response time, making it ideal for gamers and video enthusiasts alike, as well as movie production houses that work with fast-motion graphics. The groundbreaking speed virtually eliminates motion blur and ghosting, delivering stunning motion imaging that enhances movie watching, game playing and internet streaming. Combined with an impressive 70,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and 1920x1080 resolution, you get a monitor that captures all the action in unprecedented color, contrast and razor-sharp crispness. Of course, speed is just one part of the story. Samsung's HDMI connections provide the fastest, most secure way of connecting high-definition devices and experiencing the joys of digital output in its purest form. Whatever you need to connect, from DVD players and camcorders to video game consoles and digital cameras, it's connected with ease. And to make sure you don't miss a thing, there's MagicAngle. Whether viewed face on, from above, from the side, or from below, there's a setting to ensure you see full brightness and color from every angle. The Samsung P2770FH. Speed has never looked better
